@usedefault
{{html:
<!-- ko if: sshKeys().length > 0 -->
<h1>SSH keys</h1>
<!-- ko foreach: sshKeys -->
    <input type="text" data-bind="value: name">
    <textarea name="" id="" cols="30" rows="3" data-bind="value: key, valueUpdate: 'afterkeydown'"></textarea>
    <input type="submit" value="Destroy" data-bind="click: destroy">
    <br>
<!-- /ko -->
<!-- /ko -->

<h1>Create SSH Key</h1>
<input type="text" data-bind="value: newSSHKey().name">
<textarea name="" id="" cols="30" rows="10" data-bind="value: newSSHKey().key, valueUpdate: 'afterkeydown'"></textarea>
<input type="submit" value="Create" data-bind="click: addSSHKey, enable: !!(newSSHKey().name() && newSSHKey().key())" class="btn btn-info btn-large ">
}}
